plot: A clown with the flu must perform at a children's party. As the moment approaches, nothing goes right. We learn that no matter what, the show must go on.
title: Scenes from an Unmade Movie: Job
plot_es: A clown with the flu must perform at a children's party. As the moment approaches, nothing goes right. We learn that no matter what, the show must go on.
original_name: Scenes from an Unmade Movie: Job
plot_en: A clown with the flu must perform at a children's party. As the moment approaches, nothing goes right. We learn that no matter what, the show must go on.
